Author: livipup
Text: That wouldn't be healthy. I would recommend at least a few supplements. If you're interested in my advice click the spoiler.   >!Try these:!<  >!Whey Protein Powder (24 Grams per scoop): 1.5 scoops!<  >!Potassium Citrate Powder: ¾ tsp!<  >!Ensure High Protein Shake: 1 bottle!<  >!Vitamin D: 400 IU!<  >!I was just doing some meal planning and it occurred to me that pretty anything I combined with these supplements (at around 1600-1700 calories) would be healthy. I didn't try just a single food and I imagine that would still lead to nutrient deficiencies, but doing just one food per day would be way worse than doing one food with supplements.!<
